name: Second Win Pack
description: Unlocked when someone signs the board for the 2nd time. Adds new missions, events, and evolution rules.

data.title: Private Missions
data.content: Starting with this game, each player receives a private mission card at game start in addition to their regular mission.

rules.text: Each player receives 1 private mission card at game start
Private missions remain secret and separate from regular missions

rule.text: Cities now provide +1 to recruitment calculation (evolution rule)

changes.text: Winning a game awards 1-2 stars based on stars already on the board. With evolution, may award more.
